page.title: 05SCHOOLS IN BIRSTALL
page.content: In the term in which you are 5 you start at{Highcliffe or Riverside {Primary Schools.}There is no selection and at 11 you transfer to{Stonehill {High School and Community College.}At 14 you go to{Longslade School}for at least 2 years.{Richard Hill Primary {School}serves Thurcaston. This year saw the amalgamation of the Junior and Infant Schools at Highcliffe to make a Primary School. A new path, now a flight of steps, was built to link the two separate buildings. A structure is also being bought to cover the outdoor pool. When the Elmfield Building first opened 21 years ago as a primary school, it won a{Civic Trust Award}for architecture. To mark the anniversary, celebrations took place including a concert at which past and present pupils performed.
